name: SHEDG
description:
SHEDG is an action horror game

the game is still in development.

SHEDG stands for

S - Self Destruction

H - Hunted

E - Enemies are Weapons

D - Death is not the end

G - Glitch

Thanks to Indie Wild Quarantine Jam

Game created using

Unity3d,  Fuse,   Mixamo,  Particles effects pack, Maya,  Paint3D,  visualStudio
